4Tbj0cLlcEQUNnp1oj6S.title: Lange Nacht der Museen - Kulturforum Swing Party
4Tbj0cLlcEQUNnp1oj6S.description:
Bei der Lange Nacht der Museen wird auch gefeiert und getanzt.
Im Kulturforum /National Galerie findet eine 20er/ Swing Party statt. 
Claire & Diana tretten jede Stunde auf & gibt eine kurze Charleston Einführung. Ausserdem spielt Swingboper als Marching Band immer als kurze Set drussen, wo Essensstände und Getränkestände auch zu finden sind.
Auch sehr schön ist neben unserer Tanzfläche sind eine Weinbar und eine Cocktailbar. Ihr erlebt wie Kulturforum für Tänzer lebendig wird.
Zum Tanzan ist der Eintritt frei :D Komm´& geniess´ das tolle Wetter, schöne Veranstaltung, Tanzen, essen und trinken im Museum.
DJ Evan ist für die Musik zuständig. 
Verpasse´ die Lange Nacht der Museen mit Swing Tanz nicht! 
https://www.lange-nacht-der-museen.de

as0tQOZraVv9Xe5XP5SH.title: Outdoors!
as0tQOZraVv9Xe5XP5SH.description:
We're back with a newly-constructed floor. Drop on in for a dance in the green and glorious surroundings of Jockel Biergarten, very near the Landwehrkanal in Kreuzberg. There's beer, lemonade, and food there, not to mention plenty of sun- and all the fresh outdoor air you can breathe. (There is a bit of shade available as well.)

There are both indoor and outdoor spaces to dance, so we can dance in all weather conditions.

With DJ! Toss a bit of cash in the hat: your generous donations help keep the whole flying outdoor circus running.

HriD752zkQbmc59YS4Vm.title: CANCELLED (SUMMER BREAK) - JAMMIN' WITH THE JAM CATS
HriD752zkQbmc59YS4Vm.description:
Live music every week
2 dancefloors: 1 for Lindy & Balboa 1 for Blues

To find Freudenzimmer: Enter the first yard / first side-building, then second floor / left door

HEY, YOU COOL CATS! We have a new event for you! The Jam Cats live session carries on the legacy of the BLAUE STUNDE - strictly in danceable tempo! - mingling live sessions, concerts and DJ-sets.


We want everyone to have fun, dancers and musicians alike with a stage open for early Jazz, Jive, Swing, RnB, and other fun styles to dance to. The jam will be run by members of the Syncopation Society to ensure that the party flows, allowing everyone to dance, or to simply sit back and enjoy the music.

ENTRANCE:
5€ - 10€ sliding scale - Pay 5 if you're low on cash, or 10 if you got money to flash.

paoxRWN6WKtLjsjUyxEk.title: Sunset Swing
paoxRWN6WKtLjsjUyxEk.description:
Come fly with us: we'll dance OUTDOORS against the imposing backdrop of Tempelhof's huge Hangar 1, surrounded by greenery. Shake it to the best swing music under a fiery sky as the heat of the day fades into the cool of night.

The dancefloor opens at 20:00. Come one, come all!

With DJ.

Eintritt: Spende. Your generous donations help keep us aloft- thanks for the support!

Directions here: 
https://scontent-ber1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/67252330_3346806091999992_6469231482429767680_n.jpg?_nc_cat=101&_nc_oc=AQmF4eeWrEPi6_o1YY4xVGgga6grk3Ejp88b2yp5Z9Kc2K-nt2J_nJdFD9I_kMY3VpCgf3Zw4Vtvdyl06fbECJNx&_nc_ht=scontent-ber1-1.xx&oh=24c291053ca9606457fdbb8d4b78b5aa&oe=5DA440BE

1YRoWcbYIAvaBwAzxgGr.title: SwingStep // Panke Parcours
1YRoWcbYIAvaBwAzxgGr.description:
Im Rahmen von Panke Parcours 2019 ist SwingStep das erste Mal auch mit dabei. 
Panke Parcours ist ein Kulturfestival direkt bei uns um die Ecke. Entlang des kleinen Flüsschens Panke werden 13 Bühnen mit unterschiedlichstem Programm bespielt. Neben Konzerten und DJ-Sets gibt es auch Führungen, Film, Theater, ein Entenrennen und Workshops.
Kommt vorbei, schaut euch das bunte Treiben auf dem Parcours  an, tanzt mit uns und lernt den Wedding von seiner schönsten Seite kennen! ❤️

18:00 - 19:00 Swing Workshop für Einsteiger
19:00 - 20:00 Social Dance

cAQSdmzMuh3gJz0xTiRM.location: U5 Abgedreht Klub, Frankfurter Tor Nr. 9 (down in the tower, entrance from Karl-Marx-Allee), 10243 Berlin (Karte)
cAQSdmzMuh3gJz0xTiRM.description:

Facebook-Event

More information: https://swingpatrolberlinen.weebly.com/shag-club-drop-in.html

CbT0E5072MZlkWPaD9YM.title: Back to School - The blunder years swing party
CbT0E5072MZlkWPaD9YM.description:
the end of summer is a grieving time full of holiday blues, memories of our summer lovers and PTSD flashbacks to the sound of buzzing mosquitos and screams of ice cream dipped children stampeding thorugh the streets. As we are all preparing to re-start our post-vacational routine, we’re propose you: let's have one last summer ball. 

But there are sacred rules to this party. 

1.    No one shall miss the photoshoot. Come in your best blunder years self outfit. That outfit you wore to your yearbook picture, the hardcore expression of your 15 year self, the one you would wear for your myspace profile picture, the one from when your Messenger username was xXxLadyDarkness85xXx: we want to see it. Non-awkward pictures will not be tolerated in our photobooth. 
(Need inspiration? Take a look! https://imgur.com/a/FnYKJDn)

2.    NO RUNNING IN THE CORRIDOR.

3.    There will be no crowned prom kings/queens nor crowned competetors, but you can show your best moves in our trio showdown. (Need inspiration -again-? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kdQJaakCgcA). You can sign up for the showdown here: https://forms.gle/Xs2cw3fESq21mg2s9 

4.    Your parents are not letting you drive in their SUV yet? Come with your bike. A janitor will be outside from 21:00 to 22:30 to repair your bike for free. 

5.    Don’t be a dick. 

👾 PARTY SCHEDULE 👾


21:30 – 22:30 DJ Ana Maeso
22:30 – 23:15 Live Music (Band TBA!)
23:15 – 23:30 DJ Ana Maeso
23:30 – 00:00 Dance Trio Showdown 
00:00 – 00:45 Live Music (Band TBA!)
00:45 – 2:00/until we stand DJ Battle 

🎟️ PRICES 🎟️

🌟Entry: 
11 Euros normal price 
9  Euros showing your best blunder years outfit 


You can pre-register here: https://forms.gle/qXKuGQBMNG7z51AP6

📺  WHY THIS PARTY? 📺

Transparency is important to us, so here you go! The Cronopias been invited to perform at Blue Skies Lisbon 2019, but we need to fund our trip somehow. All earnings from the door will go to pay for flights and studio training times, and all earnings of the bar will go to the awesome staff of this venue that is helping us put this party together.  Not only you’ll be showing off your freshly cut mullet for the sake of 80’s haircuts beauty, you’ll also be doing it for a Good cause!

Gs1iXE38d0qUzLfBHXcW.title: Swingtanzen macht froh!
Gs1iXE38d0qUzLfBHXcW.location: Tangotanzen Macht Schön, Oranienstraße 185, 10999 Berlin, Germany (Karte)
Gs1iXE38d0qUzLfBHXcW.description:
The beautiful hall at Tangotanzen macht schön is just begging for a swinging evening. And so shall it be! Come and enjoy the finest live music in a brand new location with a wonderful parquet floor, professional ventilation, and, of course, glorious sound system. And a piano.
 
Eintritt 10-12€, sliding scale
 
21:00-21:30 Social dance floor opens with DJ
21:30-23:30 Live music with Pauline Peek and her Sweet Nothings
23:30-close DJ
 
Pauline Peek and her Sweet Nothings are:
Pauline Peek - vocals
James Scannell - saxophone
Charles Frechette - guitar
Sidney Werner - bass
Aidan Löwe - drums

Die schöne Räume bei Tangotanzen macht schön sehnen ja nach einen swingigen Abend. So soll es sein! Komm und lass dich tanzbegeisternde Livemusik genießen- in einen nagelneuen Location mit wunderbaren Parkett-Boden, professionelle Lüftungssystem, und natürlich, ordentliche Beschallung. Und ein Klavier.

https://www.facebook.com/events/428590627866325/

keep swingin'! berlinhop.com

PFL2qnZfxQOVxLYGCSwE.location: Else Biergarten An den Treptowers 10, 12435 Alt-Treptow (Karte)

🥁Chikara Aoshima – drums
🎤Irene De Matteis - voice
🎻Daigo Nakai - duble bass
🎸Marco Papa – guitar, arrangements 
🎺Davide Provenzano - trumpet

Summer in Berlin can be so great! Join us for our free & weekly OpenAir Dancing direct by the Spree tuesdays in Else Biergarten close to Ostkreuz | Treptower Park. Get a drink, sit down at the Spree, meet amazing people, dance your feet off... life couldn't be nicer :) Everyone is welcome!

SfgiiQXkZT3wKw5HUuNh.title: bauhaus meets charleston
SfgiiQXkZT3wKw5HUuNh.location: festivalzentrum im bauhaus reuse, Ernst-Reuter-Platz (Mittelinsel), 10587 Berlin-Charlottenburg (Karte)
SfgiiQXkZT3wKw5HUuNh.description:
Das Bauhaus wusste die Feste zu feiern: Kehraus-Fest, Weißes Fest, Metallisches Fest, um nur drei der legendären Feiern zu nennen – und immer mit dabei: die Bauhauskapelle. „das fabelhafteste war die bauhauskapelle. keinschlager. keine melodie. aufreizende monotonie. starker rhythmus. tempo“ wie schon ein Bauhäusler schrieb.

Die bauhauswoche feiert zum Ausklang am Samstag eine große Charleston- und Swing-Party, mit Live-Musik von „Kind of Dukish“ und den beiden DJ’s Wuthe und Swingin’ Swannee.

 
Eintritt frei

HeY9pMHVPLj8xaUEfQHN.title: Old Fish Jazzband at Jockel
HeY9pMHVPLj8xaUEfQHN.description:
Old Fish are a Berliner original- back when they were playing, we were still dancing Charleston in basement clubs with way too few fire exits, electro swing was just starting to become a thing (You heard Shemian - 1927 everywhere you went), and everybody loved Dixieland, even the electro folks.

Join us for some glorious blood-pumping New Orleans jazz from some of the widest-traveled musicians in Europe at the Jockel Biergarten on Wednesday!

Doors open with DJ'd music at 21:15. Band starts around 22:00. Dancing will take place INSIDE.

Entry 8-12€, sliding scale.

https://www.facebook.com/events/534477303955006/

bpcwLDL2ho19FNmlYtjz.title: SWING Fever
bpcwLDL2ho19FNmlYtjz.location: Haus der Sinne, Ystader Str. 10, 10437 Berlin, Deutschland (Karte)
bpcwLDL2ho19FNmlYtjz.description:
Swing Fever   –  with Harald Hertel's Jam Swingers, 
Swing dance party with lots of best danceable live music -
Swing til you drop....
with DJ Capt'n K., who plays pure Swing from the end 20's to 30's, 40's and 50's.
Recommended dress code: 20's to 50's, but dress like you want.
Fee: 7,- to 10,- Euro (sliding scale).
Smoking and chilling outside in the second backyard.
Location.


Swing Fever   –  mit Harald Hertel's Jam Swingers, – es wird wieder ein schweißtreibender Tanzspaß. Die Band spielt ab 22 Uhr 2 lange Sets, davor/danach Swingtanz mit DJ Capt’n K.: Lindy Hop, Balboa, Shag, Charleston und alles was die Füße können, zu authentischem 20er bis 50er Jahre Swing aus Capt’n K.’s reichhaltigem Fundus. Der Hof steht wie immer zum Verschnaufen und Rauchen zur Verfügung.


Dresscode-Empfehlung: 20er- bis 50er-Jahre-Style.
Eintritt: 7,– bis 10 ,– € nach eigenem Ermessen. Nicht verpassen... Flyer.
Das Line Up der Jam Swingers:
Julian Gretschel - Posaune
Florian Heidtmann - Saxophone
Daniel Hoffmann - Kontrabass
Harald Hertel - Gesang/Gitarre/Kazoo

fcb2DRWHJzYiv4ueA6O5.title: Outdoors!
fcb2DRWHJzYiv4ueA6O5.description:
We're back with a newly-constructed floor. Drop on in for a dance in the green and glorious surroundings of Jockel Biergarten, very near the Landwehrkanal in Kreuzberg. There's beer, lemonade, and food there, not to mention plenty of sun- and all the fresh outdoor air you can breathe. (There is a bit of shade available as well.)

There are both indoor and outdoor spaces to dance, so we can dance in all weather conditions.

With DJ! Toss a bit of cash in the hat: your generous donations help keep the whole flying outdoor circus running.

4EhYvD3kVfJXXvlQSMy1.title: JAMMIN' WITH THE JAM CATS
4EhYvD3kVfJXXvlQSMy1.description:
Live music every week
2 dancefloors: 1 for Lindy & Balboa 1 for Blues

To find Freudenzimmer: Enter the first yard / first side-building, then second floor / left door

HEY, YOU COOL CATS! We have a new event for you! The Jam Cats live session carries on the legacy of the BLAUE STUNDE - strictly in danceable tempo! - mingling live sessions, concerts and DJ-sets.


We want everyone to have fun, dancers and musicians alike with a stage open for early Jazz, Jive, Swing, RnB, and other fun styles to dance to. The jam will be run by members of the Syncopation Society to ensure that the party flows, allowing everyone to dance, or to simply sit back and enjoy the music.

ENTRANCE:
5€ - 10€ sliding scale - Pay 5 if you're low on cash, or 10 if you got money to flash.

2pfvbwyXGZUvZUr827rS.title: Swingtanzen macht froh!
2pfvbwyXGZUvZUr827rS.location: Tangotanzen Macht Schön, Oranienstraße 185, 10999 Berlin, Germany (Karte)
2pfvbwyXGZUvZUr827rS.description:
The beautiful hall at Tangotanzen macht schön is just begging for a swinging evening. And so shall it be! Come and enjoy the finest live music in a brand new location with a wonderful parquet floor, professional ventilation, and, of course, glorious sound system. And a piano.
 
Eintritt 10-12€, sliding scale

21:00-21:30 Social dance floor opens with DJ
21:30-23:30 Live music with Declan Forde and his Orchestra
23:30-close DJ
 
Declan Forde and rhis Orchestra are:
Declan Forde - piano
Pauline Peek - vocals
Dima Bondarev - trumpet
James Banner - bass
Ugo Alunni - drums


Die schöne Räume bei Tangotanzen macht schön sehnen ja nach einen swingigen Abend. So soll es sein! Komm und lass dich tanzbegeisternde Livemusik genießen- in einen nagelneuen Location mit wunderbaren Parkett-Boden, professionelle Lüftungssystem, und natürlich, ordentliche Beschallung. Und ein Klavier.


https://www.facebook.com/events/504589473635651/

keep swingin'! berlinhop.com

hBo997wpa7x7u9CbnaCQ.title: Der Löwe tanzt #45 to a band that can...
hBo997wpa7x7u9CbnaCQ.location: Alter Roter Löwe Rein, Richardstraße 31-32, 12043 Berlin (Karte)
hBo997wpa7x7u9CbnaCQ.description:
... be called 'Pauline Peek and Her Sweet Nothings'
Willkommen zur nunmehr sechsten Löwenswing-mit-live-Musik-Saison!
Oha.
Pauline Peek - Vocals Declan Forde - Piano James Banner - Bass Jordan Dinsdale - Drums

☝wir bitten um einen Kulturbeitrag zwischen 7 und 10 €
♥ und bieten Kaffee, Kuchen, Wein, short 'n' sweet Vinyl
und keine reine Männerbande ;)

YMua5BB7XnKceZJvXzho.title: 12. at Swingtanzen macht froh!
YMua5BB7XnKceZJvXzho.location: Tangotanzen Macht Schön, Oranienstraße 185, 10999 Berlin, Germany (Karte)
YMua5BB7XnKceZJvXzho.description:
It's been a year full of outdoor dancing, indoor dancing, visa worries, and ...Mexican food, for some reason.

Now that I've received my visa (YESSSSS!), I'm looking forward to celebrating my 12th Berlinniversary with friends old and new in the finest swinging fashion. We'll have a beautiful swinging combo led by pianist Declan Forde on the evening.

Entry is an Berlinniversary-appropriate 12€. If you moved to Berlin in 2007, your entry is FREE! Write me a message and I will put you on the guest list.

I am looking forward to a wonderful party! 

(Maybe I'll even speak a little German. ACHTUNG, WITZ: Natürlich werde ich Deutsch reden.)

21:00-21:30 Social dance floor opens with DJ
21:30-23:30 Live music with Declan Forde and his Orchestra
23:30-close DJ

https://www.facebook.com/events/492427404892014/

keep swingin'! berlinhop.com

eX3cBYe3lKYTQmfjRYI1.description: This is a swing jam session intended for dancers, jazz lovers and musicians. Are you coming to dance or enjoy music? We ask for 5-10€ at the door. u3s9w6n6ti6NrciYLSaB.title: Uptown Lodown: Havana in Harlem
u3s9w6n6ti6NrciYLSaB.description:
It is easy to see and feel: the Lindy Hop and Cuban Rumba both are deeply rooted in African culture. Their grounded, rhythmic and at ease character as well as freedom and naturalness of movement strongly represent this heritage. And furthermore, the cultural melting pot of late 1920’s New York brought together musicians and composers from Harlem, Cuba and Puerto Rico, all influencing each other, offering and creating a rich landscape of dance music, including swing. In the 1930s to 50s, New York's many ballrooms like the Savoy were cooking with various styles of music and dance, and old-timers claim that “everybody danced everything”.

Get your dose of Caribbean ease and swinging happiness with live swing music as well as DJed Cuban and swing music from the 1930s, 40s and 50s.

Here we are again on the fine floor at Nou Tango. The home of one of the best dancefloors in Berlin, Nou is extremely cozy, with easy ambiance and a relaxed atmosphere. Dance and enjoy the glorious parquet floor, or kick back with a glass of wine and enjoy the view.

21:00 Dancefloor opens
21:30 Rumba performance by Lisandra Cervantes, followed by a short Rumba taster
21:30-23:30 Live music 
23:30-close DJ

Party entry 8-10€, sliding scale.

https://www.facebook.com/events/369945013677751/

keep swingin'! berlinhop.com

L6xuxBRoWGOEwXV0Hxpo.title: Outdoors!
L6xuxBRoWGOEwXV0Hxpo.description:
We're back with a newly-constructed floor. Drop on in for a dance in the green and glorious surroundings of Jockel Biergarten, very near the Landwehrkanal in Kreuzberg. There's beer, lemonade, and food there, not to mention plenty of sun- and all the fresh outdoor air you can breathe. (There is a bit of shade available as well.)

There are both indoor and outdoor spaces to dance, so we can dance in all weather conditions.

With DJ! Toss a bit of cash in the hat: your generous donations help keep the whole flying outdoor circus running.

Swing Night in the ballroom of Villa Neukölln 

21:00 - 02:00 Uhr DJ 

Eintritt: 7-10 € 

Die Villa Neukölln bietet jeden Donnerstag Swingtanz zu Live-Musik in einem der schönsten Ballsäle der Stadt!  In die Nacht tragen euch DJs und unsere schöne Saalbar! Die Villa ist barrierefrei und freut sich über alle TänzerInnen in ihren liebsten Kostümen! 

Villa Neukölln welcomes all the beautiful dancers in their prettiest dresses to the Swing Night in our huge 20s ballroom!  Our ballroom bar is there for watching and having a nice little drink. Villa is accessible by wheelchair.

Swing & Jive Tanztee
Jeden Sonntag erfüllt ein anderer DJ Eure Musikwünsche - gebt ihm Input.
Wir haben Spaß auf bestem Tanzparkett mit Aussicht auf ganz Ostberlin bei gutem Sound - in Berlins ältester Panorama Bar. 

Immer Sonntags ab 16:30 Uhr.
Parkettgeld: 5,- € 
Genießt die spektakulären Sonnenuntergänge bei einem Drink oder bei Kaffee + Kuchen im PlaceOne.

Wir freuen uns auf Euch:

1. Sonntag im Monat - DJ Harald Hertel
2. Sonntag im Monat - DJ Hari-Bo
3. Sonntag im Monat - DJ Capt'n K.
4. Sonntag im Monat - DJ Jumpin' Andy

Anfahrt: 
U5 Strausberger Platz / U5 Schillingstraße (5 min Fußweg von Alex)
Autofahrer - Parkplätze vor dem Haus sind vorhanden

Ring at "13. Etage" and take the elevator on the right.
